long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The images produced by the system present small windows into other universes, to give small glimpses of the views the person could experience at possible future points in time. In another parallel world, the system uses voice detection algorithms, and natural language processing, to pull dynamic social media data shared on open social image networks.
